meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>present</kanji> <kanji>location</kanji> is the <vocabulary>scene</vocabulary> of the crime! And you're on the scene to check out what's currently going on.
readingMnemonic: The reading is a combination of the on'yomi and kun'yomi readings. That being said, both readings for both kanji are the readings you learned already, so you should be able to read this.
